Utils3D

Class Plane

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils3D.Plane

  • public class Plane
extends java.lang.Object
    Plane is a common implementation of a 3D infinite plane. Every plane verify this equation for every (x, y, z) : (a * x) + (b * y) + (c * z) + d = 0
    Since:
    2.0
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double a
      Coefficient "a" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + (c * z) + d = 0
      protected double b
      Coefficient "b" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + (c * z) + d = 0
      protected double c
      Coefficient "c" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + (c * z) + d = 0
      protected double d
      Coefficient "c" in the equation : (a * x) + (b * y) + (c * z) + d = 0
      protected double precision
      Precision use for computes.
